name: I love my chickens
description:
This is a little defense game made in a week. I'm hoping you to figure out how to play but, here's how: You must keep chickens out of the dark, pick up the lamps and leave them close to the chickens to keep them safe. Harvest chicken's eggs and place them on the basket. Your objective is to get as many eggs as possible.
PRESS F TO PAY RESPFULL SCREEN.

Made with Godot Engine for Godot Wild Jam #14: Shadows
Used Wildcards: -What the Cluck? -Trick or Treat!

Some sound effects are from Nick Judy's Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1G-yh8Xvv1cMxzR_PUQlpw
